content: shown on p 24 of *under cover 60 afghans to knit and crochet* skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 4 colors 12 balls total crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm afghan is made of three 14 x 62 panels sewn together each panel is worked in a different color sequence crochet border to finish available in different colorways 1294a prairie stripes homespun throw 1 *prairie gothic olive antique* 60487 three-panel striped afghan 2 2005 *fiesta grape fuchsia candy apple* see 1114ad prairie stripes knit throw 3 for a knit version 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-prairie-stripes-homespun-throw-1 variant=32420064624733 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-three-panel-striped-afghan-1 variant=32420029071453 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/prairie-stripes-knit-throw
